title: A1706 2016 Macbook pro 820-00239 Backlight short
message: Hello sorry if this question has already been posted I have a A1706 2016 Macbook pro 820-00239 it has the daughter board to the LCD when connected only to the small LCD flex farthest away from the main connector I get half back light ie gaps between lights on the screen, If I power down and connect the one closest to the main connector from the main board it kills all back light or stops the laptop turning on at all the flex has wear and tear damage ie a crack in the cable this is my first encounter with this model has anyone either repaired this cable or replaced it or are they integrated to the point it will need a full screen replacement? any help would be appreciated KJS

title: A1706 2016 Macbook pro 820-00239 Backlight short
message: I thought it is a pretty obvious separate cable. Not replaced it yet, but pretty sure it is no issue.
